isis.stitle: TSI 06-16-01 - Metal Repair Procedure for Corrosion

geninfo.para: Recommended paint repair for International truck body panels when corrosion is present.

svcproc.title: Service Procedure

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, wear safety glasses, paint and body shop mask and outer clothing when performing this paint repair procedure.

step1.para: Wash the entire vehicle with warm water/detergent solution. Allow to dry 1 to 2 hours.
Remove all rivets, fasteners, door frames, luggage rings, etc. that exhibit signs of (filiform) corrosion or other damage.

step2.para: Aluminum, sand with #150 to #180 grit paper dry
Cold roll steel, sand sequentially with #80 then #120 grit paper dry
Galvanized steel, sand with #120 grit paper dry
Stainless steel, sand with #150 to #180 grit paper dry

step1.para: Make sure all signs of corrosion are removed from the substrate during the sanding process. This includes corrosion that may be present in or around rivet and fastener holes. Feather the edges of areas requiring heavy sanding with sequentially finer grades of sand paper.

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, wear safety glasses, paint and body shop mask and outer wear when cleaning with compressed air. Use regulated dry air with a OSHA approved blow gun.

step1.para: Remove any dust and sanding debris by using compressed air to blow off the surface.

Degrease the surface with appropriate/compliant Sikkens Surface Cleaner. Use two cloths, the first wet with surface cleaner and the second dry using wipe on / wipe off procedure. Follow the instructions in the Sikkens Technical Manual for Surface Cleaners.
Mix one part (volume) of Washprimer CR with one part (volume) of Wash Hardener. Stir thoroughly.

Apply the mixed Washprimer CR in one medium coat to the vehicle. Film build target is 0.3 to 0.4 mils (8 to 10 microns). Specific application recommendations are provided in the Sikkens Technical Reference Manual for Washprimer CR.
Allow the paint to flash for 15 minutes at 70°F.
Replace any rivets, fasteners, door frames or luggage rings removed in Step 2. Use Fusor 800 as the sealer between the ring and the door skin.
Repeat Steps 5 to 9 touching up heads of rivets and fasteners.

caution.para: Steps 13 to 15 must be completed within 8 hours of application of Washprimer CR to assure adhesion.

step1.para: Mix appropriate Colorbuild color for topcoats being applied then add 10% of Autocryl Elast-O-Actif (if required). Mix thoroughly.

Combine 3 parts (volume) of Colorbuild primer from Step 12, with 1 part (volume) Colorbuild Surface Hardener and 1 part (volume) Colorbuild Surface Activator. Mix thoroughly. If additional flow and leveling is required for large areas or hot weather, add 10% Autocryl Reducer to this ready to spray mixture.

Apply the mixed Colorbuild in two medium coats to the vehicle. Film build target is 3.0 to 4.0 mils (75 to 100 microns). Specific application recommendations are provided in the Sikkens Manual for Colorbuild.
Allow to dry for a minimum of 30 minutes at 70°F, if longer than one hour, thorough sanding is required to assure topcoat adhesion.
If sanding is required, use #360 to #400 grit paper dry or #500 to #600 grit paper wet. After sanding, degrease the surface with appropriate Sikkens Surface Cleaner as indicated in Step 6.

Consult the vehicle lineset to determine the corresponding Nav four digit color number. Topcoat with Sikkens Autobase Plus or Autobase followed by Autobase III, Autoclear HS Plus or Autoclear II LV, following the instructions and recommendations provided in the Sikkens Technical Reference Manual.

note.para: If Washprimer CR or Colorbuild is not compliant for your area please contact your local Akzo Nobel Technical Consultant.

svcproc.para: Autobase Plus Blending Additive is a crystal clear blending additive that allows for easier application of Autobase Plus spot repairs. As there is no mixing required, it is very easy to use. Use Autobase Plus Blending Additive as a foundation for fade out areas or use it as an additive to Autobase Plus colors, solid or metallic, before the application of the fade out coats.

When mixed with Autobase Plus basecoat, Autobase Plus Interior Converter Gloss and Mat is a low gloss specialty coating designed for application over existing and new interior automotive parts. The gloss and mat interior converters provide consistent performance in a wide range of colors. Those colors are specifically matched to both the color and gloss of OEM standards.

Autobase Plus 3 step Special Effect Colors provide unique color and flip/flop effects when viewed from different angles. These colors are not available from the mixing system; therefore there are eight pre-packaged (ready mixed) colors available. Autobase Plus Special Effect Colors are designed for custom finishing and must be used in conjunction with Sikkens clearcoat in order to provide protection from the environment.

para.emph: AUTOBASE® PLUS SOLID, METALLIC AND PEARL COLORS

svcproc.para: Autobase Plus provides excellent coverage, metallic control and sprayability when used to duplicate OEM solid, metallic, and pearl color effects. Autobase Plus must be used in conjunction with a Sikkens clearcoat in order to provide protection from the environment. Autobase Plus is the superior choice to achieve optimal color match.

Vehicle body parts made of deformable plastics require special flexible paints. Addition of Autocryl Elast-O-Actif improves the flexibility to such an extent that the paint can tolerate deformation of the plastic parts without cracking or chipping.

Autoclear III is a National Rule compliant acrylic urethane clearcoat for use with Sikkens basecoats. The product can be used as a high gloss clearcoat or as an ultra productive clearcoat in both air-dry and baking environments with the use of different hardener and activator combinations.

Autoclear HS+ is a high solids acrylic urethane clearcoat for use over Autobase Plus. A National Rule compliant acrylic urethane clearcoat, Autoclear HS+ offers high gloss and is designed for baking conditions. With the choice of activators, can be used for small areas and large areas under different temperature environments.

Autoclear Mat is a two part acrylic urethane clearcoat with mat finish. Higher gloss levels can be reached by mixing with any Sikkens urethane clear; i.e., Autoclear III or Autoclear HS+. The main application is to achieve a lower gloss level over plastic parts. For VOC recording, Autoclear Mat will be listed as a specialty coating under "Elastomeric Refinishing" or "Antiglare Coatings".

The Colorbuild undercoat system consists of six colored primers which, when mixed in proper combination with each other, achieve colors closely resembling the most popular topcoat colors. Depending on the mixing ratio utilized, Colorbuild can be used as a primer surfacer or wet-on-wet primer sealer.

Degreasers are solvents especially formulated to remove grease and other contaminants from bare metal, existing finishes, plastic, etc. Sikkens has three types of degreasers available to best suit your shop and the substrate to be degreased:

A self-etching washprimer that offers superior corrosion resistance and excellent paint system adhesion to steel, galvanized steel, aluminum, and stainless steel. Washprimer CR is used to duplicate automotive manufacture corrosion resistance without the use of metal preps and conditioners.
